description:
Sagano Megumi is close friends with Karen Ichijou and Tsumugi Yuuki. She belonged to the girls` basketball team when she was in junior high, but became the manager for the boys` basketball team because there was no girls` team in high school. Though she seems concerned about her classmates` relationships, she does not seem to care about her own, and thus has no boyfriend. The Sagano Line refers to the portion of the San`in Main Line within Kyoto Prefecture.
Is the single daughter of the "Sagano Traditional Cuisine" and enjoys having lunch with Ichijou and Lala.
name: Sagano Megumi
